verses.text: \w Then|strong="H5375"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H1004"\w* \w instructed|strong="H6680"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w steward|strong="H1004"\w*: “\w Fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* men’s sacks \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w as|strong="H1004"\w* \w much|strong="H6310"\w* \w food|strong="H1004"\w* \w as|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w can|strong="H3201"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* each \w one|strong="H6310"\w*’s \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* sack.

\w Put|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w cup|strong="H1375"\w*, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w one|strong="H6310"\w*, \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w* \w one|strong="H6310"\w*’s sack, along \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w grain|strong="H7668"\w*.” \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* steward \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w had|strong="H3130"\w* \w instructed|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w At|strong="H7971"\w* \w daybreak|strong="H1242"\w*, \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w men|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w on|strong="H7971"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w way|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H7971"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w had|strong="H3130"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w gone|strong="H3318"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* told \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w steward|strong="H1004"\w*, “\w Pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H7451"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* once, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, ask, ‘\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H5892"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w repaid|strong="H7999"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*?

\w Is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w cup|strong="H1931"\w* \w my|strong="H6213"\w* master \w drinks|strong="H8354"\w* \w from|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w uses|strong="H5172"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w divination|strong="H5172"\w*? \w What|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7489"\w*!’”

\w When|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* steward \w overtook|strong="H5381"\w* \w them|strong="H5381"\w*, \w he|strong="H1696"\w* relayed \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H5381"\w*.

“\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w my|strong="H6213"\w* lord \w say|strong="H1696"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w*?” \w they|strong="H4100"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*. “\w Your|strong="H6213"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w could|strong="H2088"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* possibly \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w We|strong="H2005"\w* \w even|strong="H2005"\w* \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H7725"\w* sacks. Why would \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w steal|strong="H1589"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w or|strong="H3701"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* master’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*?

\w If|strong="H1961"\w* \w any|strong="H1571"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w*, \w he|strong="H1571"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w rest|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w slaves|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* lord.”

“\w As|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3651"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w*,” replied \w the|strong="H1697"\w* steward. “\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w only|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w cup|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w slave|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w rest|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w free|strong="H5355"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* blame.”

\w So|strong="H3381"\w* each one \w quickly|strong="H4116"\w* \w lowered|strong="H3381"\w* \w his|strong="H6605"\w* sack \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H6605"\w* ground \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w it|strong="H3381"\w*.

\w The|strong="H4672"\w* steward \w searched|strong="H2664"\w*, \w beginning|strong="H2490"\w* \w with|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w oldest|strong="H1419"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w ending|strong="H3615"\w* \w with|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w*—\w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w cup|strong="H1375"\w* \w was|strong="H1375"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*’s sack.

\w Then|strong="H7725"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w tore|strong="H7167"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w clothes|strong="H8071"\w*, \w loaded|strong="H6006"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w When|strong="H5307"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* brothers arrived \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ground|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w deed|strong="H4639"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*?” \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w declared|strong="H3045"\w*. “\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w divine|strong="H5172"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w truth|strong="H3808"\w*?”

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* lord?” \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*. “\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* plead? \w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w justify|strong="H6663"\w* \w ourselves|strong="H6663"\w*? \w God|strong="H3027"\w* \w has|strong="H3063"\w* exposed \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*. \w We|strong="H2005"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w now|strong="H1571"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* lord’s \w slaves|strong="H5650"\w*—\w both|strong="H1571"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w one|strong="H1571"\w* \w who|strong="H5650"\w* \w was|strong="H3063"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w cup|strong="H1375"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3027"\w* replied, “\w Far|strong="H2486"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*. \w The|strong="H6213"\w* man \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w cup|strong="H1375"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w slave|strong="H5650"\w*. \w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w rest|strong="H7965"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* return \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* father \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w approached|strong="H5066"\w* Joseph \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “Sir, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* personally \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* lord. \w Do|strong="H3063"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* equal \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* himself.

\w My|strong="H5650"\w* lord \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w his|strong="H7592"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, ‘\w Do|strong="H3426"\w* \w you|strong="H7592"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* father \w or|strong="H5650"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* brother?’

\w And|strong="H2205"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* answered, ‘\w We|strong="H4191"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w an|strong="H3426"\w* elderly father \w and|strong="H2205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w younger|strong="H6996"\w* brother, \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w his|strong="H4191"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w age|strong="H2208"\w*. \w The|strong="H4191"\w* \w boy|strong="H3206"\w*’s brother \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* only \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w his|strong="H4191"\w* mother’s \w sons|strong="H3206"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w*, \w and|strong="H2205"\w* \w his|strong="H4191"\w* father loves \w him|strong="H4191"\w*.’

\w Then|strong="H7760"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w told|strong="H7760"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, ‘\w Bring|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w so|strong="H7760"\w* \w that|strong="H5650"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w can|strong="H5650"\w* \w see|strong="H5869"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* myself.’

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w my|strong="H5800"\w* lord, ‘\w The|strong="H5800"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w his|strong="H5800"\w* father. If \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H5288"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w leave|strong="H5800"\w*, \w his|strong="H5800"\w* father \w would|strong="H5288"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.’

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* said \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, ‘\w Unless|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w younger|strong="H6996"\w* brother \w comes|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w with|strong="H3381"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w*.’

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w returned|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* father, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w relayed|strong="H5046"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7725"\w* \w our|strong="H7725"\w* father said, ‘\w Go|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w buy|strong="H7666"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w some|strong="H4592"\w* food.’

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* answered, ‘\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w unless|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H7200"\w* \w younger|strong="H6996"\w* brother \w goes|strong="H3381"\w* \w with|strong="H3381"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w*. \w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H7200"\w* \w younger|strong="H6996"\w* brother \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H3381"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w*.’

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w* said \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w*, ‘\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* wife \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w me|strong="H3205"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H3205"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w gone|strong="H3318"\w*, \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*: “\w Surely|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w has|strong="H3318"\w* \w been|strong="H2963"\w* \w torn|strong="H2963"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w pieces|strong="H2963"\w*.” \w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w since|strong="H2008"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1571"\w* if \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w harm|strong="H7451"\w* \w comes|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w gray|strong="H7872"\w* \w hair|strong="H7872"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H7451"\w*.’

\w So|strong="H6258"\w* if \w the|strong="H5650"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* \w with|strong="H5315"\w* \w us|strong="H5315"\w* when \w I|strong="H6258"\w* return \w to|strong="H5650"\w* \w your|strong="H6258"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* if \w my|strong="H5650"\w* father, \w whose|strong="H5650"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* wrapped \w up|strong="H7194"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H5650"\w* \w boy|strong="H5288"\w*’s \w life|strong="H5315"\w*,
